661140.name: Cattails Original Soundtrack & Deluxe Content
661140.description:
This DLC contains the full Cattails Original Soundtrack, a beautiful 18-page artbook PDF, and a unique color for your cat in-game.

Cattails Original Soundtrack

45 minutes of happy, kitty-inspired music by Tormod Garvin!

Cover art by Markus Garvin.


Tracks Included:
  • Main Theme - 2 min
  • Summer 1 - 2 min
  • Summer 2 - 2 min
  • Summer 3 - 2 min
  • Autumn 1 - 2 min
  • Autumn 2 - 2 min
  • Autumn 3 - 2 min
  • Winter 1 - 2 min
  • Winter 2 - 2 min
  • Winter 3 - 2 min
  • Spring 1 - 2 min
  • Spring 2 - 2 min
  • Spring 3 - 2 min
  • Playful Cutscene - 1 min
  • Nostalgia Theme - 1 min
  • Hallowed Theme - 1 min
  • Battle Theme - 1 min
  • Credits Theme - 2 min
  • Love Theme - 2 min
  • Mining Theme - 2 min
  • Mining Theme 2 - 2 min
  • Festive Theme, Spring - 1 min
  • Festive Theme, Summer - 1 min
  • Festive Theme, Autumn - 1 min
  • Festive Theme, Winter - 1 min
  • Mystic Theme - 1 min
  • Mole Brothers Theme - 1 min
  • Training Theme - 1 min
  • Total: 45 min

Deluxe Cat Color - Orange Bengal

You'll receive a unique color for your cat to use in-game! You can use this new color at any time by accessing your inventory, selecting 'Change' on the cat preview window to the right, and clicking the appropriate color tile in the customization panel.

Cattails Artbook PDF

This booklet contains tips, tricks, artwork, and insight into the Cattails project. Get a behind-the-scenes look at our early prototypes and take a peek at how the game came together in this beautiful PDF.



You can access the artbook in-game from the settings menu.
